descriptionlist.description:
Simple tweak requested on reddit by the user /u/Dragos_01 that's supposed to simulate the rounded Corners and Edges of the new Samsung Galaxy S8.
This is a purely cosmetic tweak that doesn't add or interfere with any functionality of your phone, if it does please contact me.

changelog.change:
v0.0.1-33+debug
- Added rounded screen corners (preference bundle with corner radius coming on next update!).
